Introduction
This topic contains information on processing
VA Form 21-0538
and
VA Form 21P-0537
, including
system establishment of end product (EP) 330 upon receipt of
VA Form 21-0538
surviving spouse’s or Veterans’ option of verifying the status of dependents by telephone
processing
VA Form 21-0538
processing
VA Form 21P-0537
VA Forms 21P-0537
showing the surviving spouse has not remarried
unsigned and/or incomplete forms
, and
notifying other business lines of a change in status
.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B - Verification of Marital Status and the Status of Dependents
citation: Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B
